attributes.action: Release all Scots, Welsh & Irish MP's from Westminster. They should adequately represent their own countrymen
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: All MP's in London should be English. Let the Scots,Welsh and Irish MP's return to their homeland & give their time & energy to their own people and Not be allowed to interfere with English Politics. The English do not seek to sit in the Welsh assembly, nor the Scots Parliament, so why should they wish to interfere with our parliament. England to be ruled by the English. Please.

reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
